rdf:Description.dc:title: Tales of the Sun: Or, Folklore of Southern India
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Georgiana Kingscote (1860–1908)
Saṅgendi Mahāliṅga Naṭeśa Śāstrī (1859–1906)
